hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then echo '[Type-check] Type-checking edited file...' && npx tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>&1 | head -20 || echo '[Warning] TypeScript errors detected in edited file'; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then echo '[Linting] Linting edited file...' && npx eslint --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>&1 | head -10 || echo '[Warning] ESLint warnings in edited file'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.json$ ]]; then echo '[Validation] Validating JSON...' && jq empty "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>&1 || echo '[Error] Invalid JSON syntax'; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then echo '[Type-check] Type-checking new file...' && npx tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>&1 | head -20 || echo '[Warning] TypeScript errors in new file'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then echo '[Linting] Linting new file...' && npx eslint --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>&1 | head -10 || echo '[Warning] ESLint warnings in new file'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.json$ ]]; then echo '[Validation] Validating JSON...' && jq empty "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>&1 || echo '[Error] Invalid JSON syntax'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ package\.json$ ]]; then echo '[Validation] Validating package.json structure...' && npm pkg fix 2>&1 || echo '[Warning] package.json validation warnings'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_PARAMS" =~ (rm|rmdir|mv.*\/dev\/null|>.*\/dev\/null) ]]; then echo '[Warning] WARNING: Potentially destructive command detected!'; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]] && [[ -f "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" ]]; then echo '[Backup] Creating backup: ${CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS}.backup' && cp "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" "${CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS}.backup" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
